entry.dcterms:title: Academic Calendar of the 2001/2002 School Year - Opinions About School Holidays. Sample of parents.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E44s: Academic Calendar of the 2001/2002 School Year - Opinions About School Holidays. Sample of parents.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Sági, Matild
entry.dcterms:description: opinions about school breaks, the starting of the school year; opinions about the free development of the 2001-2002 academic year school schedule, problems at school, and in the life of the family
entry.dcterms:subject: education, school
household
survey data
cross-section
This probability sample was selected from households with children between 6-18 years. Within the selected households the interviewers interviewed the parent who keeps contact with the school.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
A
